Class CompanyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code10.kts.controller.CompanyController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/companies")
public class CompanyController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing companies.

      • findAllUnassigned

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findAllUnassigned(@RequestParam
                                                                              long buildingId)
        GET /api/companies Gets all companies not assigned to a building yet.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building's id
        Returns:
        Response entity with list of companies still unassigned to a building
